bibl.title: Burial Practices at Third Century A.D. Deir el-Medina as Evidenced from a Roman Painted Shroud in the Rijksmuseum van Oudheden, Leiden.
Deir el-Medina in the Third Millennium A.D. A Tribute to Jac.J. Janssen
bibl.author: MONTSERRAT, Dominic

bibl.note: Leiden, R.M.O. Inv. F 1968/2.1. Painted Shroud, 65 x 53 cm. Deir el-Medina, tomb 1447, c. 170-220 A.D.
bibl.seg: MONTSERRAT Dominic, Burial Practices at Third Century A.D. Deir el-Medina as Evidenced from a Roman Painted Shroud in the Rijksmuseum van Oudheden, Leiden.
R.J. DEMARÉE and A. EGBERTS (Edd.), Deir el-Medina in the Third Millennium A.D. A Tribute to Jac.J. Janssen = Egyptologische Uitgaven. 14 (Leiden, 2000) pp. 277-286, 2 figg. et pl. XXXIV.
